name: Careful Study
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
flavor_text: Books are like crops—they must be thinned for best yield.

name: Coffin Purge
oracle_text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Flashback {B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Deep Analysis
oracle_text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: "Change your mind, or I'll change it for you."

name: Ghastly Demise
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature if its toughness is less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Anyone can snap her fingers and yank a soul. I prefer to kill creatively."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Llanowar covers a million square miles, yet nobody enters the forest without the elves knowing it.

name: Memory Lapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text: "Eri phar phesta … um, phistor … er, phistara …"

name: Mental Note
oracle_text:
Mill two cards.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Some minds are more open than others.

name: Nightscape Familiar
oracle_text:
Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.
flavor_text: Nightscape masters don't stop at raising the spirit of a fallen battlemage. They raise the flesh along with it.

name: Ray of Revelation
oracle_text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Webs of illusion unravel in the light of truth.

name: Recoil
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.
flavor_text: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

name: Repulse
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

name: Rushing River
oracle_text:
Kicker—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Werebear
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Threshold — Werebear gets +3/+3 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: He exercises his right to bear arms.

name: Wild Mongrel
oracle_text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
